shows.title: Cut Capers
shows.desc: Shakespeare fans among you will know that to cut a caper means to do a little happy dance, in the manner of a goat. We can’t think of a better soundtrack for such an activity than this ridiculously funky nine-piece band from Bristol, whose style effortlessly and joyously straddles hip-hop, ska and swing. They’ve even got a horn section (geddit?).
